website_summaries.verdict: A sliding workout machine that may not give enough direction for beginners.
pros: Light, quiet to use, and easy to store
Versatile design allows you to perform numerous different upper body exercises
cons: Doesn't come with a workout guide, so you may need to search the internet for a range of drills

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect addition to my treadmill and stationary bike
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect addition to my treadmill and stationary bike. Assembly time is about 30 minutes. I have attached the body pro works chart for your convenience. Overall, this bench is well worth the investment. Over 25 exercise options. I highly recommend this to anyone like myself who doesn't require a gym membership.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The seat does not slide up and down.The lock mechanism was misaligned on the machine. Like another user on here, I had to take out the lock button to allow it to slide but now I can't do exercises where the seat needs to be stationary. The incline adjustment is dangerous. Its design makes it very difficult for one person to adjust safely. I purchased this based on all of the positive reviews. I wish I hadn't purchased this and I wish I had paid for attention to the reviews - the real ones.
customer_reviews.author: MooGooGaiBoo

customer_reviews.title: Bumpy ride!
customer_reviews.text: Rollers have marks in them. 1st time using felt very bumpy. Checked rollers and they have notches , grooves in them. Box was delivered totally smashed . Weider customer service also has the rudest customer service reps ive ever dealt with..What a very horrible stressfull experience!!!!
customer_reviews.author: push thru

customer_reviews.title: UNSCREW THE PEG 44 COMPLETELY
customer_reviews.text: The product was put together okay, almost every attachment came dented or damaged in some way superficially which can be expected in shipping. But the way part 44 is installed, that is NOwhere on the manual description that physically keeps the machine from moving. UNSCREW THE BASE COMPLETELY, PULL PEG OUT, THEN PUT BACK IN< SHOULD WORK. The machine won't operate if you don't figure this out. According to youtube, looks like hundreds have had the same issue. I almost returned thinking I got defunct product!! Will update after I have been able to see what it can do. Weider Customer Service was great and very helpful and was willing to replace any damaged parts.
customer_reviews.author: H.M.

customer_reviews.title: Cancelled GYM membership
customer_reviews.text: ...due to Coronavirus. I originally was planning to get Total Gym, but this machine seems to be pretty much the same thing, at a much lower cost. I removed the end plate because it to serve no purpose, or maybe I just haven't figured it out what's it's for. As a regular GYM goer I tend to stick to heavy settings and this machine offers enough resistance that I felt fatigued after a few minutes. You could also hold a weight bar on your chest to increase resistance for a leg workout. I don't think I'll be rejoining a GYM any time soon since this fits my needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: BoycottAmazon

customer_reviews.title: This works great but the steel tubing is so thin that the ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great but the steel tubing is so thin that the welds on the foot pad lower bar broke within six months. Fortunately I am a welder so I took it apart, rewelded all the joints and added gusset supports to beef it up. I will spend the money and research for a heavier duty one the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Deer Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This might sound like a vain review, but I went to the beach for an annual family picnic. Last year, I was covered up and hoping to look as great as some of the other moms in their late 30s. Ha! This year, after working out using my UBW, I am pleased to announce all the other moms' mouths were on the floor! Not only have I lost weight, from size 14 to 10, I am toned. Not skinny fat! I am now "pretty stong for a girl" as my husband says. But I don't have bulging biceps. Ladies, give this a try. It is worth it. It's not just for men!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Effective machine for home workouts with a few flaws. Construction is a bit wobbly (even after tightening all screws and adding a mat underneath, machine shifts left and right significantly). Handles are smooth plastic so they can become slippery after a while (used sand paper to scuff them a bit for grip). And shoulder bar placement is awkward, I feel like they could have added a lower bar for a more natural feel
customer_reviews.author: JACKjack

customer_reviews.title: Not the total gym by a long shot
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this....I had a total gym for years and sold it 5 yr back because I had no room....but I missed it and had room in my new house so I thought this might be a good replacement. But it's very wobbly that I'm not comfortable increasing the incline and the track isnt smooth like the total gym when trying to do an inverted sliding crunch....pretty disappointed. It's too bulky to try to return, guess it will be in my next yard sale
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Owen

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend got this and now he's happy
customer_reviews.text: WIth the pandemic going on and gyms closed, I found myself living with a man on the brink! - a lifer gym-rat with nowhere to go. To the rescue, this contraption. So clever that he can do his entire body on it (and he's been doing weights for decades so that's saying something) - I can even go on it although usually he tells me I'm doing it wrong and manages to mention enough anatomical names for muscles that I'm put off and he gets it back to himself. Then I sneak back on when he's not around and it's pretty awesome. Great bit of kit.
customer_reviews.author: techieshopper

customer_reviews.title: The bonus workout is adjusting it.
customer_reviews.text: Because it gets stuck every effing time I adjust the length and incline. I’m going on my 1st week with this machine. With all gyms shut down and the covid-19 lockdown, this was the most versatile and budget friendly option. When it is set up and adjusted, it’s great, the glide is good and there are lots of workout variety especially in combo with weights (I decided to try this before getting more plates). It was easy to assemble and folds great if you live in a small place. It’s the world’s most frustrating warmup to set it up if you fold it after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Gym without the price tag :)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product, because I wanted the Total Gym experience without the price tag. So far, I've really enjoyed it, and it gives me a new kind of workout that I otherwise wouldn't have been able to get at home. It's much cheaper than a Total Gym, but basically does all of the same things (in my understanding), and I even purchased the Total Gym exercise chart to go with it. Also, I'm a 4'11" woman, in case any short people are wondering if they can comfortably use this device.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gym substitute during Corona-time!
customer_reviews.text: Picked up this puppy on Amazon the night they closed my gym for Corona virus. It is amazingly well built and high quality. Thought I'd be getting a "barely better than nothing" workout based on the price but you can get a surprisingly great workout if you design it well using online "sliding bench workout" charts. While is is really sturdy and durable, since it uses your own weight and gravity for resistance, it is way lighter than home gyms that have resistance bands or weights. Folds up in a few minutes. Really impressed with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Package showed up it good condition. I'm a woman 5' 10", 165 lbs. Was able to carry box in the house by myself. Set up took about 15 by myself. Very sturdy equipment. Like other reviewers said, a brochure of the exercises would of been nice. Saved pictures from the box as reference. For the money it is a very good bargain. The board was comfortable when laying on it. The hand grips are very nice, easy to grip. I'm a CNA and lift a lot of bariatrics so this will help keep toned. Machine isn't too loud so I can watch TV without blasting the volume. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great machine...but buyer beware of other companies
customer_reviews.text: this machine is really good slide is very good ...also be careful with other companies selling this item for double the price...on a regular day this was $129.99 now that covid19 has hit these companies want to sell it for $301 ....luckily I found it here for $149....stop taking advantage of people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would prefer a more sturdy machine
customer_reviews.text: Wobbly, unstable ......the bungee cords hook ends, snapped after the first week. And its very heavy. Also the cables are too long
customer_reviews.author: Cell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and missing many parts.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived damaged and was extensively and shoddily taped. We have a photo of the damaged box. There were many components missing including the foot plate, L-Pins, M8X52mm bolts, M8 Locknuts, and M* washers. It did not have a manual or parts list - we had to get this on the web. Obviously, the device cannot be used. Trying to get the situation resolved has been a nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love this gym, but...
customer_reviews.text: Really love the gym but only giving 3 stars: #1: took 3 months to get from original order date; #2: had to go to You Tube to find a fix for the back board that I couldn’t get to move when I set it up and #3: no exercise chart with even the basic exercises/ descriptions to get you started except for the advertisements on the sides of the box (by the way, cut them off and save before you recycle your box). Other than that, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia

customer_reviews.title: Inferior to total gym
customer_reviews.text: This machine is not as good as expected. The pulleys are made of a cheap plastic with no bearings, this creates a lot of friction and noise (squeaking and friction) while using the cable hand attachments. This noise is a constant noise, and the more weight on the machine the louder it gets due to lack of bearings (I only weight 150lbs). Additionally, the sliding track is nowhere near as smooth as a total gym would be, seeing that I’ve owned a total gym in the past. The attachment for squats is very narrow which causes your knees to be in a position that puts a lot of stress on them.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value, good workout, great versatility. Cann accomplish every basic strength target but limited to tension/resistance on-board. So really advanced/heavy workouts are better suited for free weights or a platform. This achieves the basic and even moderate level of training. If you have Ling hair, put it in two side braids because a pony will get caught under the bed on the runners and a bun will give you a neck ache. Also, If you're tall, like over 5'9" you'll have to scrunch very compact to fit on the bed and you'll need extensions for the cables. I'm 5'9" and barely fit lengthwise. I combine this with TRX.
customer_reviews.author: Shapal

customer_reviews.title: Solid and diverse workout equipment for a total body workout
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a month ago. ETA was August 30 but it came in as early as today. It’s a solid piece of equipment that offers many bodyweight exercises like the Total gym does for a fraction of a price. If you want to look on exercises on this sliding bench I recommend searching for the total gym exercises on youtube since they are similar. You will not get ripped using this but you will build up a lean and strong foundation of your muscle groups to help prevent injuries when you take up heavier weights. You’ll get your money’s worth on this one.
customer_reviews.author: C and K

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value, but wish it was lighter
customer_reviews.text: It's just about impossible to beat the value of this machine as it gives you all the benefits of a Total Gym, plus additional resistance in the form of bungee cords. Features wise, it compares to some of the most exepnsive Total Gym models while coming in at a lower price than the most basic Total Gym model. The additional resistance available from the the bungee cords puts it over the TG in available resistance. However, the Weider is also much heavier and more cumbersome to fold and unfold compared to the more basic TG models and that may discourage some people or smaller women from taking it out and using it.
customer_reviews.author: C L Abello

customer_reviews.title: Stop buying other products, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! You can literally work every part of your body with this machine. It was very easy to put together, it comes mostly assembled, you only have three screws and four hooks (two sets). It IS long but does fold up. You can do your legs too, not just your upper body! Ladies, this takes some of the pressure off your knees when doing squats. Men, if you want EXTRA resistance, if your body weight isn’t enough, there are bunji cords under the bench that hook on to the foot platform. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: YES YES YES-- A HOME GYM THAT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't read any further-- just buy this. Ignore the negative reviews-- this thing was a breeze to put together (and I hate putting things together) and it works like an absolute charm!! I actually look forward to using it and it doesn't take up a ton of space. Forget the stationary bikes, the Bo Flex yada yada--this pulley system works like isometrics and you'll see results but best of all you won't hate jumping on to use it.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO Tep

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but does it all.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving 5 stars because for a simple home gym, this is it, for me. It was very easy to set up, I did it alone, but I would recommend two people for most. Mainly due to some awkwardness in extending the workout bench. It is also somewhat awkward in some of the workout positions, like kneeling. I flung myself face first into the bench trying out a kneeling exercise. This was due to being unfamiliar with the movement, and balance. It is not for everyone, especially people who want weights, or dumb bell type of workout. It is not what I really want, but for my small home, with no space left, it does the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bench - great value!
customer_reviews.text: This bench has been a very good workout for my husband and I. There's several exercises as outlined on the very nice laminated chart by quickfitposters.com that you can purchase for $10 on Amazon. It's worth it! I've been in therapy for rotator cuff issues, and, was skeptical that this may not work for me, however, I have not had any discomfort, and, can tell I'm gaining strength in my shoulder/rotator cuff areas. Also, my husband is recovering from C-5, C-6, and, C-7 replacement from herniated discs. Very beneficial for ALL of our needs!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy N.

customer_reviews.title: A VERY easy pass.
customer_reviews.text: So I had this less than 36 hours before I returned it. 5 stars on assembly/user friendly to assemble. And now it goes downhill. The back only extended once and then not again. I read reviews and found I’m not the only one that has encountered this issue. Then the bench wiggled a lot and felt cheaply made. Won’t recommend at all and advise to look at something else.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this home gym exerciser. Good quality and great exercise for a 70 year old woman.
customer_reviews.text: This body works gym was easy to set up; it took approximately 30 minutes. It appears well made, heavy to move. I had to turn on side to raise and lower the gym. The biggest negative for me is there was no exercise table or manual or video. I have contacted the manufacturer 3 times but "no" response yet. The exercise manual would be very helpful for learning the correct way to do exercises, and how to do them at all. This is an edit. Customer service got back to me with an apology and they are sending the exercise table/manual.
customer_reviews.author: PAF

customer_reviews.title: Solid workout tool. Good price, easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping in tone and working out in general. I just had both knees replaced and find this a great tool for restoring range of motion to my legs and building strength. Also helps with my upper strength which is important while working on legs. It was easy to assemble and seems to be very good quality. I waited to review until after I had used for couple of months. Zero problems so far and I’m not really expecting any. I recommend it with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed by everyone for the little money it cost.
customer_reviews.text: Jonesing write now , because I can’t get to mine do to high water across roads getting to my other home. I Love it , makes me a better person inside and out , physically as well as mentally. I should be a seals man for it. I am 60 now and can’t wait to get on it every day.
customer_reviews.author: The old wise Man.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine I believe has been underestimated. I am from an athletic background and currently in the military. This by far has been the best workout machine I've ever used that targets every area of my body. My husband loves it and it's very rare my husband likes a workout machine because he's into more of a calisthenics routine. The reason I gave it four stars instead of five was because when putting it together, that very first step gave us some trouble because the knob wouldn't come out. We had to take the knob out and slide it up and then put the knob back in. Other then that, everything else was fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tye

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: It was as expected. Sturdy equipment and I get a full body workout with it. Love it! Be careful not to hurt your fingers when adjusting the bench. Adhere to instructions on stickers that say "do not put hands here!". I'm enjoying this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: GYM RAT THUMBS UP
customer_reviews.text: I've been a gym rat for 40+ years and always looked down on these, but age and shoulder replacement (x2) have made this a valuable fitness tool. If you have the room to set it up, you can get a dam good workout, even if you're not an old gym rat. Many levels of challenge, and easy to adjust. And in COVIC 19, a great investment in fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Oncearunner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I hate it when someone says, "for the price", But really, the low price on this item is not a reflection on this product at all. It is well built, very sturdy, and work more than every penny. Okay, I have not tried the more, way more, expensive models, but this one works great. I am 6', 194 pounds, and when I am on this unit it is rock solid and full range motion. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Baxley

customer_reviews.title: Compact and versatile total body workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in the wake of the Coronavirus scare when all gyms in my state closed until further notice. This is the perfect piece of home exercise equipment when you can’t make it to the gym. It offers a versatility to perform many of types of exercises that target most muscle groups. The adjustable resistance is a great feature as well. Best part of this product? It folds up into a compact form that can be stored upright or laying down! If you are looking for a piece of home exercise equipment that will essentially help you accomplish a total body workout at home without breaking the bank, I would highly recommend purchasing this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not much to say it does what it shows
customer_reviews.text: not really what i wanted after i got to use it. I need more of the traditional gym. I get tendentious, so need to lift correctly not try to change my lifting to adapt to pulleys that are fixed in the wrong location for what i'm doing. chest fly's ect. Just my opinion. For me i don't like it, someone else might love it.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Newell

customer_reviews.title: Enhances my workouts
customer_reviews.text: I have the Weider home gym and this adds some new exercises to my home workouts. Some people think that this is cheap material but in comparison to Mr. Norris system, the cost difference is considerable for something just a bit sturdier. Now at age 76, I only need it to keep my body in shape and I am not one of those serious body builer that needs the best equipment they can get. This is plenty good my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Beats going to the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I have had an older version of this for years, and it is still going strong. I am now moving back and forth between two residences in different states, and after a few months of trying (or planning to try) free weights and other equipment that could accomplish the same thing, I bought a second Ultimate Body Works. It is quick, simple, and effective, and at this price, I can afford to have two!
customer_reviews.author: PH in Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but could use better hardware pins.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a workout sheet with this unit, and really enjoy it. It's well made, not wobbly, although I'll be replacing the bottom pins with bolts as the pins slide right out. These are only for the foot plate, which doesn't move in any case, but I'm a bit of a perfectionist.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, and flawless functioning.
customer_reviews.text: This 'workout partner', of mine, is not only what I was looking for, but even better than I'd hoped for. It is solidly constructed, and offers SO MUCH versatility. Considering the low price factor, I was prepared to have to realize some shortcomings, but had made up my mind to accept them. I mean, how much quality could be expected from such a device, with its cost being just a tad over $100? But, BOY was I wrong. The ONLY thing that I should NOT have done was to buy an extended warranty, for it. I don't see that I might ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Alston

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: Contacted amazon and manufacturer both are horrible at customer service!!’ The locking mechanism is broken I am assuming and the bars will not go back in the bars at the top are slightly damaged maybe because of shipping!!! Amazon telling me to disassemble and return because it’s stuck in extended form but I honestly wouldn’t know where to start!!! $123 wasted
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Welds on main frame adjacent to foot plate came apart.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this for almost 4 years of regular use. Then one day while doing squats I felt a forward movement on the foot plate and then snap! The welds just behind where the foot plate attach to the main frame gave way. Upset and giving two stars for what appears to be a weakness in the design. Would have hoped to have got longer use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: JJ McC

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this was great except trying to tear all the damn plastic off of it. It is so damn stupid that they put plastic underneath it between all the cables and frame. The machine itself is great fun to use. I'm sore as hell and can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: aron sprague

customer_reviews.title: NO ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS, PARTS MISSING
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much an 80 pound useless pile of crap. It came with no assembly instructions and no nuts or bolts. After 15 minutes on hold with support I was told to call back tomorrow. I will update my review as I progress through support. UPDATE: After an hour on hold I got a live person on the line. We had to go through the online manual as I tried to identify all of the parts that were missing from my box. That process took another 30 - 40 minutes. Waiting on the parts, hopefully they are all there.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Larrabee

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The box actually sat in my living room for 4 days before I finally just broke down and hauled it up to my workout room and assembled it by myself. I was initially waiting for help from a friend because there were so many reviews highlighting difficulties with assembly-and there is even a caution in the instructions that states it’s a two-person assembly job...it’s not. Just three screws and four L Pins-and you are done! Don’t let the “assembly” requirements deter you from considering this purchase as an option. And don’t pay for assembly unless you won’t lose sleep over paying close to $200 to have someone screw in three screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Full body exercise at home
customer_reviews.text: Due to the pandemic, we can no longer going to the gym, we sat home for month without our routine resistance training exercises. We remember a similar product we saw on TV over the years and searched amazon and found this great deal. We ordered it right away, unfortunately we had to wait almost 2 months to receive our order, but this is definitely worth the wait. We began our training as soon as we received it this morning. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Dewar

customer_reviews.title: it is well made works very good ,,
customer_reviews.text: it is well made,, works very good,,, well please for the money,,, would buy again ,fast shipping , it is holding up very good I push it hard for 30 min, a day ,,legs one day upper body next. An this is one hell of a work out, when I am done,,, I am 66 years old and I can work the hold body out , and not tear some thing like my weights, will due, I like weights but this has not pull are tair some thing yet, so if you need a good work out ,,get one and stay with it ,, you will be glad you did, ,,larry.
customer_reviews.author: ljh45s

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this machine but unfortunately the bungee bracket arrived broken off the machine. I thought I could possibly live without the bungee function and tried to set it up anyway but it would not open. 2 of us tried for almost two hours and it just would not upen so that we could try it out. I do believe other people have great experiences with this product when it works and I wished I could say the same.
customer_reviews.author: mary davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout for any Ability Level
customer_reviews.text: Both my sister and I both bought a Weider Ultimate Body Works because can't go to our Pilates class due to Covid. The machine is big and heavy, so make sure you have room for it. It is easy to assemble and easy to use. You can adjust it to your current ability level and make it more challenging as you improve. Buying this machine is a good investment in your physical health.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria K. Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Still great after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to review this product until I had time to use it for an extended period of time. This machine is exactly what I wanted, and at a fraction of the price of the Total Body Gym. This has the exact same features. It rolls rather smoothly, and provides a fantastic workout. If you do it right, you WILL feel that burn during and after your workout. I don't really have time to go to the gym due to my 1.5 hour commute home, so this works perfectly. I can set dinner to cook for the wife and I, and proceed to do a full body workout EVERY DAY.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wolfaardt

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best purchases I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this setup. You have quite a few options for working various muscle groups and the option add resistance via the bands gives it an edge over its competitor's setup. Fairly easy setup and pretty solid build. I also like that there is an exploded diagram that you can reference should you ever need any replacement parts. The only thing missing is an exercise chart. You can get creative with your own moves or look around online for videos and charts etc. Basically any moves you would do with the competitor's system can be done on this one.
customer_reviews.author: So

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my little “home gym”
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying a machine like this and I love it. It’s a great addition to the weights etc I already have at home. They show that you can do hamstring curls with your feet under the bars at the top of the machine. That works fine, but I bought ankle cuffs and attached them to the pulleys. Then I laid face down on the mat/board with my head at the bottom of the machine. I felt like this gave me a greater range of motion and worked my hamstrings better than their way.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K.

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting in shape!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! It was easy to put together. And easy to use. Everyday, I look forward to working out with it. I am able to get a full body workout. I really like how I can adjust the incline and add resistance to make the workout more rewarding! I'm 52 years old. So I wanted something that would be easy on the joints and fun to use. With a good diet and a workout everyday, ive lost 7 lbs already. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I still can’t Believe how cheap this thing was! Me and my boyfriend have been using it for months and it is a work horse! Extremely well built. Perfect for me, working out in public is not an option. I am also kinda small, 5’3 about 130. It’s not to big for me, and I’m still just using the machine and my own weight as resistance. I’m still working up to the resistance straps. He is 5’10 and uses it daily as well. He of course uses the straps. Highly recommended, this this is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mallarie

customer_reviews.title: All the features at less than half the price of Total Gym
customer_reviews.text: I had the first version for over ten years. Never a problem. Eventually got a gym membership, so I got rid of it. Fast forward to a few years later, and I regret getting rid of it. I purchased the new one----I dont notice any differences that arent cosmetic...and thats a good thing. Impressively solid design-heavy and thick (just the way I dont want to be). Gives you a great work out at less than half the price of a costlier Total Gym. Works all the body parts and between the different levels and bunjee cords for additional resistance, this is a machine you wont quickly master. Welcome back into my home....Ready for (at least) another decade of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bench is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Owned this bench before, over 8 years ago - loved it then, but we moved to a new state, and ended up giving it away. Found it on Amazon again (which is where we got the first one) and was amazed to see that it had not changed, other than the color of the bench - it was even cheaper than what I paid 8 years ago! LOVE this bench - gives a great workout, easy to use, and doesn't take up a ton of room
customer_reviews.author: D. Markley

customer_reviews.title: Great ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a product similar to this and I loved it but moved and it was too heavy to ship. I tried all kind of equipment and couldn't get into them like I did the old Brenda Dygraf Ultra Glide XL. I'm sure I'll be happy with this because the only difference is that this folds and the XL did not. I haven't put it together yet but gave five star for ease of assemply because I plan on having someone do it for me:)
customer_reviews.author: SIU

customer_reviews.title: The best part about it is that engages your mind as ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it six stars if I could. I have been serious about fitness for 15 years, and I have gone through all the phases- CrossFit, Olympic lifting, and so in. This is a truly versital machine. The best part about it is that engages your mind as you invent every exercise, and keeps you entertained. If you know how to work out you will have a lot of fun with this. If you don't know how they sell a work out chart/poster for these type of machines. My current favorite exercise is the one-hand hand-stand push-up.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: I love this workout system
customer_reviews.text: I started using this at my sister's when I was there for a month. I was instantly hooked. It is pretty intuative and easy to do while watching television. It is easy to put away although slightly heavy (probably about 30 pounds-check specs), I lean mine aginist the wall. (It closes up similar to an ironing board & you can remove the bottom footpiece and top arm piece by taking out the pins but that seems like too much effort to do everyday for me personally) I saw results fairly fast on a clean diet. It's pretty great deal and setup if you looking for something to do at home vs. going out to a gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Venegas

customer_reviews.title: Better than Total Gym
customer_reviews.text: Used the Total Gym for several years, but moved and no longer had access to the condo gym. This Weider machine offers the same workout, but is better in 2 ways. 1) It is way sturdier. Just a heavier build. 2) The power bands are a game changer, especially as your leg strength increases. The total gym doesn't really have enough resistance to do any meaningful leg work but the Weider really lets you work the quads. Great machine and for the price it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: steviepops

customer_reviews.title: all pros and no cons.
customer_reviews.text: Its a space saver. Fun and easy fully body workout. I have a gym room, however I just use it in my living room, fold up and put away when I have guest. Cant beat it for the cost. The only thing i can think of that I wish it has are handles on the side of the bench. A print of different workouts would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Seems dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This product really seems dangerous. I have used gym equipment for a couple decades but I am scared to use this. It seems like an ER visit waiting to happen-Potential collapse of machine or finger crushing injury just to think of two
customer_reviews.author: BDH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Overall Fitness
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but did take two of us. Similar to the Total Gym, but about $400 less. Is easy to use. I'm 57, totally out of shape, but have no problem doing a lot of the stuff. There is no exercise chart except on the cover of the box. However, you can use most exercises on Youtube for the Total Gym so if you want to work out by video you can. Heavy, but sturdy. Issue: Doesn't fold away and is very large so you need to have the room for it. I don't at this time, but like it enough I plan to find room.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn J. Bain, Christian author

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: What a great piece of equipment without spending hundreds more on The Total Gym.. I use this 4 days a week , I'm going to be 61 in a few months and this gives me a good functionally workout.. Mush better then going to the gym waiting to use machines, waiting to use a machine when the person on it is on their phone. Nice fluid movements.. I'm 5'8 and 180 lbs so this works good.
customer_reviews.author: Brtrains

customer_reviews.title: seller unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: Product great but had question on why i paid alot more than what it is selling for now. Just a simple question. No problem just wanted to know . Emailed seller twice...no response. Thankgoodness didnt have issue with the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: julie cobb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of equipment and the so versatile
customer_reviews.text: What a great product, a wonderful workout with a pilates machine. The quality of the product is super and the product is sturdy, even on carpet. You can get a wonderful work out from this equipment for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, effective way to get/stay fit, without sacrificing much space.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars for value, ease of use/assembly, build quality, and sheer variety of exercises you can do on this thing. A machine that does so much, with no weights, and only takes up the space of an ironing board when stored... Just what we needed to keep in shape living on the road in a camper. (We store it in a small trailer with our bikes.) Not perfect, (no leg extensions) But we're still discovering new ways to use this machine after weeks of use. Can't beat the price tag for what you get, reminds me of the bowflex I used to own, but it's actually faster to get a workout on this.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G.

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy piece of equipment. I was pleasantly surprised at how hefty this thing is. And if you put your mind to it, there are a myriad of exercises that can be done on it (in addition to the exercises printed on the box). One caveat, make sure you have a second person to help you put it together if you don't already have plenty of arm strength, because this equipment is heavy and needs to be extended with one arm, while pulling a knob with the other. I was able to do it by myself, but it took a lot of effort. Definitely worth the $120 I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Versatile piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: You can make your workouts as easy or difficult as you want. It is very durable and functional. I have been using one of these machines for 6 years. You are only limited by your imagination and the amount of time that you have as to what you want to strengthen. It is super easy to use and easy to set up. I used mine so much that I wore out the cables, the hand holders and the seat cushion. It was cheaper to buy a new one than replace all of the parts individually, so this is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mothers son

customer_reviews.title: Quality is in line with price
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and it was pretty easy to set up though though it arrived pretty neat up from shipping or storage at the company. Box was damaged and open but all parts seemed to be there. It works fine but you can tell they cut costs by using low quality rollers/bearings for the slide and cheap plastic handles. So it is a little loud and rough while using compared to a total gym brand. But for the price it will work for what I need. Little unstable when set up for full resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Weider never disappoints. Love it. Great machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Axmann

customer_reviews.title: Nice home gym starter.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, though I did struggle a little bit when putting the board on. Warning when adjusting the incline make sure to have a solid grip to the top of the board or the weight will fall with a heavy, heavy weight. Best to even turn it around and change the incline on the side or turned over then up right if this makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for toning and building muscle.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Way better than a Total Gym!!! The resistance bands are a very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie kite

customer_reviews.title: Great for Quarantine Working Out, Build quality good considering price
customer_reviews.text: COmpared to a total gym this product wont feel as sturdy or well made, but is functionally the same. It allows for you to gently train the whole body using body weight. Only criticism is that the foot pegs don't work for me when the foam pads are on (since they rotate around the bar I can't get a good grip with my feet).
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: That was a breeze actually and it seems sturdy. The big disappointment is that there is no ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this assembles and ready to go. That was a breeze actually and it seems sturdy. The big disappointment is that there is no guide to exercises or how to use it. Not even a poster or anything? Now that it's assembled, how do I use it? Seems a silly omission.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Service is NONEXISTENT!
customer_reviews.text: One of the nut/bolts that attaches the pulley is stripped. It is not a part the customer self-assembles. Without this bolt/nut holding the pulley in place, it renders the machine useless. I've registered the product, emailed, called, re-emailed, and can't get any type of response other than an auto-response "we've received your email and will get back with you" reply. Don't purchase this. I should have known, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: KMA

customer_reviews.title: Weider ultimate body work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about a month or so ago. I had tendinitis and haven’t been able to use it until now and that’s limited. I love this better than the Total Gym I had years ago. I’m 70 and female, it took me exactly 25 minutes to put it together by myself snd that’s because I dropped a washer and had to find it! 😬I’m so excited to finally get to use this piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.author: schnauzers

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Total Gym 1500 a few years ago, wound up getting badly damaged while moving. I bought this as a replacement about 4 months ago and it is every bit as good if not better. The bungees are definitely a welcome feature that I use during certain exercises on every workout session. If your worried about quality, don't be. This is a very well built machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bush

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good workout,  but could use some easy minor improvements that would make it much better.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good machine in the fact that you can work out your whole body, but it is slightly unstable which makes it seem a little unsafe if you're not good at keeping balance. I don't have much problems using it, but I feel if they just slightly changed some things about the design it could make it much more stable and comfortable. All in all worth the money, but I bought it for $130.00 recently the price has increased to $145.00, I'm hoping it's because they improved the design. Also the upper arm/leg bar isn't adjustable and is pretty uncomfortable on you're feet even when wearing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I've used it a few times. Having to rearrange and take some things from my bedroom so I can use it with more ease. I'm disappointed there aren't more accessories to go with it. No videos or ankle straps. I am buying something that I hope I can attach to where the hand grips are and use it for my legs during leg day. Would like the handle bars to have a different shape so my feet fit better. But otherwise its amazing and I love it. I also had to order a video from another similar exercise gym to figure out how to use it as it doesn't come with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent, unless you only use this as a laundry rack.
customer_reviews.text: Why is this only $115? It took only 20 minutes to set up by myself, and it works any muscle group I want to focus on. I have only had it a few days so I am unsure of how long it will last before falling apart, but for $115, if it only lasts a year, I’ll be happy. It appears to be solid construction. It appears to me that it will last a while with proper use. Time will tell. The only negative I can think of is the fact that it does not include a card showing all the different exercises. Unless you want to purchase one, you are forced to scour the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Cambar

customer_reviews.title: Great workout machine until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I have loved using this for working out on a daily basis but as others have stated the welds holding the leg press platform broke. It was not the metal tubing that broke but from weak welds. I had thought about purchasing another but I am afraid of it breaking again. Grant it, I can still do other workouts with it but I cannot use it to its full capability. Just be aware of this prior to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe

customer_reviews.title: One Of The Best Gym Equipment I Ever Owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: bought this due to a fractured ankle and heel accident. was looking for equipment for fractures and there's a bunch online that cost way to much for me! stumbled upon this nice piece of equipment and I couldn't be any happier. glad I bought it! much needed in any gym! recommend this to anyone recovering from any leg injuries or arm injuries. very happy with my purchase! and fast shipping can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup-Good Quality-Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This was so simple to assemble. It is mostly one unit that is already assembled in the box. We had to attached 3 items to the unit with 3 bolts and 4 pins. It was very easy and simple and took about 15 minutes or so. The only tool needed was wrench for the 3 bolts. The unit glides quietly and seems very sturdy and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Msallen

customer_reviews.title: I really love this system
customer_reviews.text: I really love this system! I have some physical limitations from sciatica and I have to be very careful of what I do so I have been looking for a way to exercise that will not hurt me, yet strengthen my muscles. You can go very low impact by putting on the lowest level of incline as well as no resistance added. This is perfect for my limitations! I will be able to add incline and resistance as my strength increases. The only issue I have is that the exercise chart/ workout guide was not included as advertised. I have messaged Amazon but have not heard anything on this issue. Therefore I couldn't give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi King

customer_reviews.title: Irregularities 🙄
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give this a fair review but be wary of the irregularities with this product. I was on my last step of assembly and of course the hole to secure the handlebar was irregular. No amount of force is going to change this strong steel to make the handlebar squeeze in there. Now I have to wait until a week day to get in touch with customer service and even at that point, the heaviest part of the system is irregular so it would be even more annoying to have to return that.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: ... using this for about 3 months now and absolutely love it and I bought one for my brother as ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 3 months now and absolutely love it and I bought one for my brother as well. There are tons of workouts you can do with this and the fact you are using your own body weight you get a very good workout without the risk of hurting yourself using free weights. Took 15 minutes to set up and folds up nicely so I can store in the corner. Out of all the workout equipment I have purchase this has been the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: TLake

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I went with this product over 'The Total Gym" because of the price difference. It is definitely worth the price. My husband had to put it together and he is very good at that, he had a little difficulty but got it. It does NOT come with any workout instructions or videos. I was able to find some on You Tube but would have liked some with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Merle Margolese

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine!! Amazing price!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very optimistic about buying a piece of exercise equipment online. It arrived the very next day i ordered it, the box was kinda beat up but everything was well padded inside , so no damage. It arrives about 90percent put together so that was a snap. I’m a big guy 6’0 280lbs ....as for exercise I was very pleased with the quality construction and how smooth it functions. This can’t be beat for the price point. I’m looking forward to how well this equipment performs. Definitely a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: jhh

customer_reviews.title: Assembled in 15 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I promise you: i had this bad boy assembled in 15 minutes and was working out shortly thereafter! Socket wrench and elbow grease is all I used. I don't think I'll try some of the kneeling exercises as I fear losing balance on the incline but maybe with a stronger core this won't be a concern. I played with it for 15 minutes and let my skeptical 6'4" husband jump on it and we are both sore! Worth every penny. We ditched our fancy gym membership for this and a few other pieces for our home gym.
customer_reviews.author: RVA mom

customer_reviews.title: Damaged when arrived
customer_reviews.text: One of the top holes to allow the handle bars to be placed in and locked would not allow the handle to go on. Side the metal was bent. I had to use my tools to adjust it (without damaging it more) to allow the piece to slide in. The wrapping is hard to get off the bottom of the vision slide (could take weeks). The machine itself is sturdy but rocky at times if your not centered on it. This is a one day review and haven’t had too much time on it since it took over an hour to get the darn handle bars in.
customer_reviews.author: 4CASTR

customer_reviews.title: Just A Fantastic In-Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! It’s cost was below its competitors’, and its capabilities and versatility is as good or better than the others. It is actually a joy to use - easy and satisfying. The degree of difficulty is up to the user, but it is really just a fantastic in-home gym.
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: This is just what i wanted from a workout. If you do the workout the right way you will see a difference in just 2 weeks I have worked out all my life but over the past 10 years I just could not get to the gym and now I have one here in my house. I use some free weights with this too. But you really dont have to i am in my 50's so I just want a good workout not to build to much. This is a good price. And when I called because Their was a small rip on the seat when it was delivered to me they sent me out a new seat.
customer_reviews.author: mrbigshot

customer_reviews.title: Not bad so far
customer_reviews.text: Box is heavy. Assembly is fairly easy. The quality of the 3 nuts and bolts you have to use isn't great. Take the weight off the base you have to attach for a much easier time. As far as use compared to Total Gym: sled is heavier on this so I found myself lowering the incline to a lower degree to get the same performance as a higher level on the TG. Also sled slides not quite as well but nothing to complain about. I only used base model TG, which this has many more exercise options. Leg workouts and chinup/pullup bar plus added resistance bands make this well worth it. I'll amend this after long term results.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. Wobbly, unstable cheep. 3 of the bungee cords hook ends, snapped of the first week.paun in the built to store. And very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great home gym!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this gym for 5 months now. Still operating just like it did when I first got it. Very happy with the quality and durability of the product. It was very easy to assemble. It's easy to collapse into the smaller storage footprint, yet very stable when extended fully. Excellent affordable home gym option!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, very versatile, solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband's birthday this year, and he LOVES it!! He has wanted one for the last few years and is VERY happy with it, and with the wide variety of things he can do, working pretty much every muscle group. It is very solid, extremely versatile (the foot-plate and the hand/grip are interchangeable, adding more variety and possibilities), he loves the ability to add extra tension with the 4 bungie-cord type bands that you can add. It folds up nicely, but is quite heavy (about 75 pounds), so not terribly easy to move around a lot. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great, adjustable, awesome all-in-1
customer_reviews.text: 4 week progress of my "quarantine diet" along with other exercises and diet adjustments plus intermittent fasting! This machine is great and there are SO many different possibilities! Check youtube for lots of instructional videos for ideas!~
customer_reviews.author: Tina Guo

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this has been the best piece of equipment I have ever used. Takes up about the same space as a basic weight bench in length without the width of the bar and weights. Wide range of workouts from cardio to muscle building. Seems to be built quite well, sturdy enough for me. I am 6ft and 196 pounds. I love the fact that there is very little prep time or to change from one workout to another.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very easy to assemble and use. I like that it doesn't take up much space. The levels of resistance are excellent, except for the leg exercises like squats. It does have increased resistance for that and a weighted vest would help, too. My only knock against it is that they advertise fifty exercises for the machine and yet the included chart only shows twenty-nine. The listed exercises don't have any isolated exercises for the lower back. After only three months of use I for sure see a difference when I look in the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pagac
